posts.post_title: PRICES SLASHED: 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Stamps lot of 3 (low grade)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are the following three 1914 T330-2 Piedmont Art Stamps.  

Included are Archer, Herzog, and Ritchie.  Technical condition ranges from Poor to Poorer on these.  See scans for condition. 

Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.  Shipping is on me.  Will accept [STRIKE]$475[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$400[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$325[/STRIKE] $275 if you purchase all three.

Jimmy Archer - [STRIKE]$125[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$100[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$80[/STRIKE] $65
Buck Herzog - [STRIKE]$190[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$165[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$140[/STRIKE] $SOLD
Lewis Ritchie - [STRIKE]$190[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$165[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$140[/STRIKE] $115
All three - [STRIKE]$475[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$400[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$325[/STRIKE] $275
